availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Fayette County, Kentucky, native. Son of William Hedges and Nancy Hardesty Hedges. Married Catherine Hedges. Father of Alonzo Hedges and Eliza Hedges. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, Lawrenceburg post office, p. 71; "Charles H. Hedges," Louisville Courier-Journal, May 21, 1912, p. 7. _Kentucky Death Records (1852-1964), KDLA, Microfilm Roll #7016143, Jefferson County, May 19, 1912, State File #12865.
